name: Vigor: Path to Vengeance
summary:
Join Adam on his path to vengeance! Discover the clues on why he became a merciless assassin in the new season, and equip yourself with his iconic gear.
The Outlands will never be the same…

This pack includes:
- Frømand (Adam's Vengeance) Uniform
- 5x L85A1 + 150 x Ammo: 5.56x45 NATO
- Brush Brown Skin
- Rectangle Black Skin
- 5x Gal + 160 x Ammo: 9x19 Parabellum
- Spray Tan Skin
- Rectangle Green Skin
- 300 Crowns
